Test Name: Progentec Aisle Dx Lupus Disease Activity Index
Purpose: To quantitatively measure lupus-related biomarkers in plasma for assessing disease activity in patients with systemic lupus erythematosus.
Container: EDTA or citrate plasma collection tube
Equipment: Progentec Aisle Dx Lupus Disease Activity Index Kit, centrifuge, pipettes, vortex mixer, plate reader
